original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord and followed completely the ways of his father David, not turning aside to the right or to the left.
korean_text: 요시야가 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 길로 행하고 좌우로 치우치지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 행동을 했고

not turning aside to the right or to the left
